info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie County through 415 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Mocksville, or near Bermuda Run, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Cooleemee, Fork Church, Advance and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
